posts.post_content: I mainly collect Zach Wheat as he was born in my hometown. I am looking for some of his tougher backs for a back run. Condition not that important. Let me know what you may have available. Thanks.
Hey buddy, see store below. Cant ship for another 6 weeks as Im out of town. Peace.

I have this Tolstoi. Not really looking to sell, but would consider an offer. Good luck on your run.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QycLGS7.jpg[/IMG]
Thanks Royce for the reply. I already have a Soveriegn 460. Aaron I have a Tolstoi but mines not graded and probably not quite as nice as yours. Thanks to you both.
Bump, looking for a Hindu Wheat. Let me know if you have one you would sell.
